subject: Shipment problem.
description_text:
Hi Guys, re: Order #SSN1925
im worried about this shipment.
Tracking number CE326618054DE

It seems to be tracking backwards from the initial destination and there is
a message saying incorrect post code. The post code (35010) and address I
provided is correct.

I paid for standard shipping and the order was made 11 days ago. The pedals
have been in sweden for more than a week. Its a little strange. See
attached image.

Do you mind investigating this

many thanks,
David.

[image: tracking.postnord.com_se_tracking_id=CE326618054DE.png]

conversations.body_text: Hi David Gareth Thomas,  We'll look into it for you right away, please don't worry.

HI again, there is definitely something wrong with this shipment.
3 days after i ordered your pedals i also ordered a wheel stand from next
level racing and it arrived today.
This shipment has been in Sweden for 2 weeks moving from one city to
another and back again.




On Wed, 16 Jul 2025 at 04:27, service@simsonn.com

Hi David Gareth Thomas,    Please don't worry, we have emailed last time to urge the logistics, we will let immediately start the investigation, if there is an accident we will re-send by express from the German warehouse.

Hi again.

Well you guys have just sent me a request to review the pedals. Obviously
they are still in sweden.so its a bit difficult to review the pedals if i
don't have the pedals.
?
See attached image. 16 days in transit. 15 days in Sweden bouncing around.
So i really do want to use them and review them properly with a youtube
video etc. But i can't do that when they are lost in shipping.
[image: image.png]


On Sat, 19 Jul 2025 at 11:32, service@simsonn.com

Hi David Gareth Thomas,    Please sign this DHL insurance statement. We are currently investigating the matter. Please do not worry, we will reship your order and compensate you for the inconvenience. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.

Please see attached image. The shipping address is very badly wrong. The
address that was provided was:

*"Veronica Garcia Almeida C/ Churruca 38 local 4 y 5 35010 las Palmas Las
Palmas Spain"*But the country was changed to Sweden. Such a bad mistake.
Please confirm the address correctly and resend ASAP.
Also, what is the compensation?

Regards

[image: Screenshot 2025-07-25 122236.jpg]

On Fri, 25 Jul 2025 at 03:18, service@simsonn.com

Hi David Gareth Thomas,    We apologise for accidentally entering SE instead of ES when placing the order. We have already arranged for a redelivery. We apologise for any inconvenience caused and will provide reasonable compensation based on the delay.
That's great. Can you give me the tracking number of the new package please?

HI again, guy you are not answering my emails in a prompt fashion which is
adding more and more dely to the shipment.
Can you get the tracking details for the re-sent package please? All of
this slow communication is adding more and more delay to the delivery.
Meaning a package from Germany to Spain has taken nearly a month.



On Mon, 28 Jul 2025 at 08:19, David Gareth Thomas <davidthomas.imo@gmail.com>
wrote:

> That's great. Can you give me the tracking number of the new
> package please?
>
> On Mon, 28 Jul 2025, 08:10 service@simsonn.com,

Hi David Gareth Thomas,  We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. Due to stock shortages at our German warehouse, we have prioritized contacting DHL to modify your shipping address. Currently, DHL has not yet responded. We have refunded you $29 as compensation. If the address modification fails, we will reship your order via UPS or wait until early August when the German warehouse restocks to reship your order. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused!

Ok it's time for me to issue a chargeback from my bank.
You told me 2 weeks ago you would send a new set by priority shipping. Now
you tell me you will not.

This is incredibly unprofessional. I do not want 29$ compensation. I want
the product I paid for. Tomorrow if there is not any news I will contact my
bank and issue a chargeback.

Hi David Gareth Thomas,    Sorry, we found out two days ago that we didn't have any stock left when we were getting ready to ship your order, so we asked our colleague to contact DHL to change the address for you. If everything goes smoothly, it should be delivered to you in three days. Please give me two more days. If we can't change the address, I can resend your order by express delivery or give you a refund. Thanks for understanding.

Ok I appreciate the prompt reply. I'll wait 2 more days as you requested
